summary: Resolved conflict in .claude-output.json by keeping the origin/main version. Our branch had deleted this file, but origin/main contains valid gRPC server task metadata that corresponds to the new files being merged in (cmd/server/main.go, internal/server/grpc/server.go, proto/alert.pb.go, etc.). Keeping the file preserves the task completion record for the gRPC server bootstrap task.
strategyUsed: chose theirs (origin/main) for .claude-output.json â€” the file was deleted on our branch but the origin/main version contains metadata for the gRPC server bootstrap task which directly corresponds to the new source files being incorporated from origin/main
